title: Transportation: Bus (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Bus subcategory within Transportation. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: I'll get off at the next bus stop.
cards.romaji: Watashi wa, tsugi no basutei de orimasu.
cards.japanese: 私は、次のバス停で降ります。

cards.english: Where is the next bus stop?
cards.romaji: Tsugi no basutei wa doko desu ka?
cards.japanese: 次のバス停はどこですか？

cards.english: Is Narita Airport the next stop?
cards.romaji: Narita kuko wa tsugi desu ka?

cards.english: I'll get off at the next bus stop.
cards.romaji: Watashi wa, tsugi no basutei de orimasu.
cards.japanese: 私は、次のバス停で降ります。
